bio.p1: I am a full-stack developer focused on building real-world SaaS platforms, real-time messaging systems and scalable web applications.
bio.p2: My experience includes modern frontend development with React/Next.js, backend APIs with Node.js and Express, real-time communication using Socket.IO and cross-platform mobile apps with Expo.
bio.p3: I enjoy transforming ideas into complete production-ready systems, from database modeling to UI and deployment.
